mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(soldOut) AS 'tot', SUM(case when soldOut = 'N' then 1 ELSE 0 END) AS 'sale', SUM(case when soldOut = 'Y' then 1 ELSE 0 END) AS 'soldout' FROM product;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product (sname, price, color) VALUE (#{sname}, #{price}, #{color})
mapper.select: SELECT `no` FROM product ORDER BY `no` DESC LIMIT 1;
